generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with visible lane markings and cars driving or parked along it.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, separated by bollards and lined with trees and plants.
- building: A large modern building with a concrete facade is prominently visible in the background, along with other buildings on the left side of the street.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the sidewalk and in front of the buildings.
- person: A person is visible on the right side of the image, riding a bicycle.
- rider: The person on the bicycle is a rider.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the street, including a black car in the foreground and several others parked on the left and right sides of the road.
- traffic sign: A blue parking sign (P) with an arrow is visible on a pole on the right side of the road.
- pole: A pole with the parking sign is visible on the right side of the road.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the right side of the image, being ridden by a person.
